Description: Condition: Excellent, very clean with very little signs of use. Original case included! have stepped in to a to fill the growing trend for all things 80’s with a modern playing, no nonsense, “throw back” workhorse. The Charvel San Dimas Style 1 HSS HT harkens back to the early DNA of Charvel, now built in the Corona factory in California USA. The San Dimas Style 1 is a solid Alder body with 1980’s body styling (But not the hair styling!). It comes with a one-piece, quartersawn, maple neck with one-way vintage-style bullet truss rod, and a 22 jumbo fret, rosewood, compound radius fingerboard with rolled edges and a bone nut. The outstanding horsepower comes from a set of well matched DiMarzio pickups in HSS configuration; A DP100 Super Distortion in the bridge and a pair of DP-116 HS2 single coils for the neck and middle positions. The 5 way “super blade” selector switch switches the bridge (Position 1), the bridge inner coil and middle (Position 2), bridge inner coil and neck (Position 3), neck and middle (Position 4) and the neck pickup only (Position 5). This brings you an interesting, and versatile range of tones. It delivers pure rock, just as you’d expect, although if that’s all you thought the San Dimas was capable of, you’d be mistaken. Charvel doesn’t complicate things any further by providing anything more than a simple volume knob for control, a side mounted output jack and a string through body, hard tail bridge. All the hardware is black and just looks stunning paired up with the satin polyurethane finishes. Features & Technical Specs: Body Wood: Alder Body Color/Finish: Satin Plum Neck Wood: 1-Piece Quartersawn Maple with Hand-Rubbed Urethane Gel Finish Neck Profile: Classic So-Cal Neck Backshape Neck Radius: 12-16" compound radius Fingerboard: Rosewood Fingerboard Inlays: White Dot Inlays Frets: 22, Jumbo Nut: Floyd Rose® Original Locking Nut Nut Width: 43mm Tuners: Charvel® Branded Die-Cast Scale Length: 25.5" Bridge: Charvel Hardtail Pickups: Bridge: DP100 Super Distortion Middle: DP-116 HS2 Neck: DP-116 HS2 Controls: 5 way selector, Master Volume Jack: Side Hardware Finish: Black Case: SKB Hard Case Included Country Of Origin: Coronoa, CA, USA Serial Number: 10327 Weight: 7.34 lbs. Switching: 5 way pickup selector: P1 - Bridge pickup P2 - Bridge Inner Coil and Middle Pickup P3 - Bridge Inner Coil and Neck Pickup P4 - Middle and neck pickup P5 - Neck pickup
Title: Charvel San Dimas USA SD1 HT HSS - Satin Plum with Case - Premium Preowned
